definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: Water Proof Switch, Used for electric kettle, Washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 防水开关，用于电水壶，洗衣机。

sentences.english: Red edge position (REP, 680-780 nm) has been used for evaluating crop leaves nitrogen status.
sentences.chinese: 红边位置常被用于监测作物叶片氮素营养状况。

sentences.english: The government brought two hundred eighty-five charges against him, mostly for murder.
sentences.chinese: 政府对他提出二百八十五费，主要用于谋杀。

sentences.english: Can be used for very elemental analysis, storage of organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 可用于很量分析元素，存储有机溶剂。

sentences.english: It is used for petroleum exploration and engineering tasks such as simulating aircraft designs.
sentences.chinese: 用于石油勘探和工程任务，如模拟飞机的设计。

sentences.english: White pearl cotton should be stitched only along the top edge.
sentences.chinese: 毛线只用于在袜边锁边。

sentences.english: Ene reaction is one of the simple and versatile reactions of organic synthesis in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 烯反应是新近被用于有机合成的简单而重要的反应。

sentences.english: While this is particularly true for primary cells, this technique can also be used for secondary cells.
sentences.chinese: 尽管对于原电池是这样，该技术还可以用于蓄电池。

sentences.english: This approach created for the treatment of induration after intramuscular injection is also very effective.
sentences.chinese: 用于创建硬化治疗后，这种做法肌肉注射也很有效。
叉形工具用于翻转栈板。

sentences.english: The AS-I interface network layer was used to carry out the interconnection communication between sensor and executor.
sentences.chinese: 接口网络层用于传感器和执行器的联网通信。

sentences.english: The magnetic coupling also can be used in autoclaves and mixers .
sentences.chinese: 磁力传动器亦可用于各种高压容器及搅拌釜上。

sentences.english: Dry tuck-pointing blades are used on hand-held circular saws and small, right angle grinders.
sentences.chinese: 干校内指向刀片用于手持圆锯和小磨直角。

sentences.english: The beholder likes to use this ray on any foe it considers a real threat.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔喜欢将此射线用于它认为真正有威胁的对手。

sentences.english: It used in the spray application of water cements and white cements.
sentences.chinese: 用于水性胶及白胶喷雾式涂布。

sentences.english: This coupon isn't good for Saturdays and Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 这张联票不能用于星期六和星期日。

definition: to use for the purpose of/to serve as
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
